title: Yuumi Q feels way different
body:
I could be going insane, but i've been playing a lot of Yuumi since her release and i feel like her Q used to start from her position but now it starts from her adc, and i feel like it controls a lot differently. 

I'm not fully sure about this but if anyone else has noticed or has any info, i'd like to hear.

replies.body:
Yeah, I noticed her Q felt different from drop. 
Seems a lot less controlled than before.
They did bug fix Yuumi's Q in patch 9.12, maybe thats why you feel a difference?

I feel like they must've unintentionally changed something else when fixing the bug. Just trying to get it to their attention asap so it can be hotfixed, i can't land a damn q to save my life now (and not to toot my own horn but i was really good before). she's probably my fav champ :(

I don't play Yuumi a huge amount but I just played a game with her and I can't say it feels any different to me. For the record, it always fired from your attached ally's position not yours, but as to any other differences you feel, I couldn't say. I don't notice anything, but I'm far from a Yuumi main.
I think i was just wrong. I must've had another issue going on that game.
